tool_description: Searches museum collections and archives to determine if an artwork was ever part of institutional collections, providing acquisition and deaccession details.

artwork_title.description: Title of the artwork to search for

error_messages: Invalid museum name: One or more specified museums are not in the database.
Invalid date range: search_period_end must be after search_period_start.
Museum database unavailable: Unable to access museum collection databases at this time.
Insufficient search criteria: Provide both artwork title and artist name for accurate search.
usage: Search museum collections for records of the specified artwork. The tool provides information about acquisitions, loans, exhibitions, and any deaccession records.

museums_found.description: Museums that have records of the artwork

acquisition_dates.description: Dates when museums acquired the artwork

deaccession_dates.description: Dates when museums disposed of the artwork

accession_numbers.description: Museum accession numbers for the artwork

current_status.description: Current museum collection status of the artwork
